title: Border, early 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, continuous braid-like
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Wide border of elaborate geometric pattern showing alternating circular motifs and X-shapes. Framed at top by rectangles and at bottom by pendants.
